Consider:
\begin{tcAthena}
declare double: [Nat] -> Nat [[int->Nat]]

assert* double-def := [(double Zero = Zero)
                       (double Succ n = Succ Succ double n)]
\end{tcAthena}
Prove the following: \smtt{(forall n . double n = n + n)}.
